short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little tool to easily timestamp in YouTube livestreams and videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pipstamp is a simple extension which provides an option to timestamp a YouTube video or livestream.

It is not limited to any specific channel, therefore it can be used on any YouTube Livestream, VOD and Video.

To create your first timestamp simply click on the clock icon which should appear in your YouTube media player.

Once a timestamp has been created a little marker will be placed on the videos timeline. By clicking on a marker you can also delete the timestamp.
Markers will always be placed on the timeline if a video has saved timestamps for it.
If a livestream has DVR not enabled the markers are not placed at the right position. Once the VOD is online and the page has been refresh they will be placed on the correct position.
